text: Lutypha is a genus of fungi in the family Typhulaceae. The genus is monotypic, containing the single clavarioid species Lutypha sclerotiophila, found in India. The generic name is an anagram of Typhula, a genus with which it has affinities. ==References== Category:Typhulaceae Category:Fungi of Asia Category:Monotypic Agaricales genera
title: Lutypha
